doc.field: 69th Street Brooklyn Ferry Corporation rate schedule notices
69th Street Brooklyn Ferry Corporation rate schedule notices

One notice listing rate schedules of the 69th Street Brooklyn Ferry Corporation, and one notice announcing rate schedule changes. Dated 1966. The 69th Street Brookyn Ferry Corporation operated a ferry between the Bay Ridge neighborhood of Brooklyn and Staten Island. Service on the 69th Street ferry had begun in 1912 and continued under various operators until 1964, when the 69th Street ferry was terminated.

One notice listing rate schedules of the 69th Street Brooklyn Ferry Corporation, and one notice announcing rate schedule changes. Dated 1966.

The 69th Street Brookyn Ferry Corporation operated a ferry between the Bay Ridge neighborhood of Brooklyn and Staten Island. Service on the 69th Street ferry had begun in 1912 and continued under various operators until 1964, when the 69th Street ferry was terminated.
Source and date of acquisition unknown. Formally accessioned in 1978.
